actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the consolidation and use of funds arising from judgments in favor of the Apache Tribe of the Mescalero Reservation and of each of its constituent groups.

summary.text: Directs that the funds which may be deposited in the United States Treasury to the credit of the Mescalero Apache Tribe and certain constituent groups of such Tribe on the Mescalero Reservation, to pay judgments from proceedings before the Indian Claims Commission, shall be consolidated and credited to the account of the Apache Tribe of the Mescalero Reservation, New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the consolidation and use of funds arising from judgments in favor of the Apache Tribe of the Mescalero Reservation and of each of its constituent groups.
